allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Kelas Olimpiade platform

Features implemented:
- Student authentication and profile management
- Admin panel for managing packages and questions
- Exam system with timer and auto-submit
- Practice mode for past packages
- E-commerce: shopping cart, checkout, order management
- Manual bank transfer payment with admin verification
- Subscription system for unlimited access
- Excel import for bulk question creation
- KaTeX support for math equations
- Landing page with company profile

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
